BELLEFONTE  Gregory M PERIOD Cellamare  of New Fairfield Conn. was ordered to stand trial yesterday on the charge of riot according to court documents PERIOD

Cellamare was at the scene of the July  riot and allegedly stole a calculator worth about  from Continental Real Estate Management Inc.  E PERIOD Beaver Ave PERIOD The window to the store had been broken during the riot PERIOD

n Lancaster resident Dan Tran  was bound over for trial yesterday on charges of receiving stolen property forgery and theft of services according to court documents PERIOD Tran allegedly used four stolen checks as payment at the Courtyard by Marriott hotel  University Dr PERIOD
